description.value: The barbarian gains a +1 bonus on ranged attack rolls with thrown weapons that add her Dexterity bonus to the attack roll. This bonus increases to +2 at 4th level if the barbarianâ€™s Strength modifier is at least +4, to +3 at 8th level if her Strength modifier is at least +6, and to +4 at 12th level if her Strength modifier is at least +8.
